pageProps.title: Comparison of React Stateful vs. Stateless Components
pageProps.metaDesc: React is a popular front-end JavaScript library that provides developers with the ability to create complex, dynamic user interfaces with ease. In React, components are the building blocks of any application. There are two types of components in React: stateful and stateless. In this article, we will compare the two types of components and discuss their differences, advantages, and disadvantages.
